ARGUMENT
w x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | resvsca.r | |- R = ( W |`v A ) |
| 2 |  | resvsca.f | |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) |
| 3 |  | resvsca.b | |- B = ( Base ` F ) |
| 4 |  | #P_elex | |- ( W e. X -> W e. _V ) |
| 5 |  | #P_elex | |- ( A e. Y -> A e. _V ) |
| 6 |  | #P_ovex | |- ( W sSet <. ( Scalar ` ndx ) , ( F |`s A ) >. ) e. _V |
| 7 |  | #P_ifcl | |- ( ( W e. _V /\ ( W sSet <. ( Scalar ` ndx ) , ( F |`s A ) >. ) e. _V ) -> if ( B C_ A , W , ( W sSet <. ( Scalar ` ndx ) , ( F |`s A ) >. ) ) e. _V ) |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_mpan2 | |- ( W e. _V -> if ( B C_ A , W , ( W sSet <. ( Scalar ` ndx ) , ( F |`s A ) >. ) ) e. _V ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( W e. _V /\ A e. _V ) -> if ( B C_ A , W , ( W sSet <. ( Scalar ` ndx ) , ( F |`s A ) >. ) ) e. _V ) |
| 10 |  | #P_simpl | |- ( ( w = W /\ x = A ) -> w = W ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( ( w = W /\ x = A ) -> ( Scalar ` w ) = ( Scalar ` W ) ) |
| 12 | 11, 2 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( ( w = W /\ x = A ) -> ( Scalar ` w ) = F ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( ( w = W /\ x = A ) -> ( Base ` ( Scalar ` w ) ) = ( Base ` F ) ) |
| 14 | 13, 3 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( ( w = W /\ x = A ) -> ( Base ` ( Scalar ` w ) ) = B ) |
| 15 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( w = W /\ x = A ) -> x = A ) |
| 16 | 14, 15 | #P_sseq12d | |- ( ( w = W /\ x = A ) -> ( ( Base ` ( Scalar ` w ) ) C_ x <-> B C_ A ) ) |
| 17 | 12, 15 | #P_oveq12d | |- ( ( w = W /\ x = A ) -> ( ( Scalar ` w ) |`s x ) = ( F |`s A ) ) |
| 18 | 17 | #P_opeq2d | |- ( ( w = W /\ x = A ) -> <. ( Scalar ` ndx ) , ( ( Scalar ` w ) |`s x ) >. = <. ( Scalar ` ndx ) , ( F |`s A ) >. ) |
| 19 | 10, 18 | #P_oveq12d | |- ( ( w = W /\ x = A ) -> ( w sSet <. ( Scalar ` ndx ) , ( ( Scalar ` w ) |`s x ) >. ) = ( W sSet <. ( Scalar ` ndx ) , ( F |`s A ) >. ) ) |
| 20 | 16, 10, 19 | #P_ifbieq12d | |- ( ( w = W /\ x = A ) -> if ( ( Base ` ( Scalar ` w ) ) C_ x , w , ( w sSet <. ( Scalar ` ndx ) , ( ( Scalar ` w ) |`s x ) >. ) ) = if ( B C_ A , W , ( W sSet <. ( Scalar ` ndx ) , ( F |`s A ) >. ) ) ) |
| 21 |  | #P_df-resv | |- |`v = ( w e. _V , x e. _V |-> if ( ( Base ` ( Scalar ` w ) ) C_ x , w , ( w sSet <. ( Scalar ` ndx ) , ( ( Scalar ` w ) |`s x ) >. ) ) ) |
| 22 | 20, 21 | #P_ovmpt2ga | |- ( ( W e. _V /\ A e. _V /\ if ( B C_ A , W , ( W sSet <. ( Scalar ` ndx ) , ( F |`s A ) >. ) ) e. _V ) -> ( W |`v A ) = if ( B C_ A , W , ( W sSet <. ( Scalar ` ndx ) , ( F |`s A ) >. ) ) ) |
| 23 | 9, 22 | #P_mpd3an3 | |- ( ( W e. _V /\ A e. _V ) -> ( W |`v A ) = if ( B C_ A , W , ( W sSet <. ( Scalar ` ndx ) , ( F |`s A ) >. ) ) ) |
| 24 | 4, 5, 23 | #P_syl2an | |- ( ( W e. X /\ A e. Y ) -> ( W |`v A ) = if ( B C_ A , W , ( W sSet <. ( Scalar ` ndx ) , ( F |`s A ) >. ) ) ) |
| 25 | 1, 24 | #P_syl5eq | |- ( ( W e. X /\ A e. Y ) -> R = if ( B C_ A , W , ( W sSet <. ( Scalar ` ndx ) , ( F |`s A ) >. ) ) ) |
